B2O.F.summary: PT Cikarang Listrindo Tbk engages in the generation, marketing, distribution, and agency of electric power in Indonesia. The company owns and operates gas and coal-fired power plants with a total installed capacity of 1,144MW; and a transmission system of 150kV across a distance of 33 kilometers. It serves approximately 2,464 customers in five industrial estates, including manufacturers in the automotive, electronics, plastic, food, chemical, and other sectors. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

KEEN.JK.summary: PT. Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as a renewable energy company in Indonesia. It owns and operates 3x6 MW hydroelectric power plant in Pakkat, North Sumatera; 3x7 MW hydroelectric power plant in Air Putih, Bengkulu; and 2x5 MW hydroelectric power plant in Madong, South Sulawesi. The company serves industries and homes. PT. Kencana Energi Lestari Tbk was founded in 2008 and is based in West Jakarta, Indonesia.

MPOW.JK.summary: PT Megapower Makmur Tbk operates as an independent power producing company in Indonesia. It generates and operates electricity from various energy sources, such as nuclear, coal, gas, fuel oil, diesel, hydro, solar, wind, marine, and geothermal, as well as provides power plant operation and maintenance services. The company was founded in 2007 and is headquartered in North Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Megapower Makmur Tbk is a subsidiary of Bina Puri Power Sdn. Bhd.

PGAS.JK.summary: PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the transmission and distribution of natural gas to industrial, commercial, and household users in Indonesia and the United States. The company operates through three segments: Gas commercial and transmission, Exploration and Production of Oil and Gas, and Other operations. It is also involved in the liquefied natural gas processing activity; trading of oil and gas; and exploration, exploitation, and business development in oil and gas. In addition, the company provides fiber optic rental for network services; construction and maintenance services to the customers; management and leasing services for buildings and equipment; and engineering and consultancy services. The company was founded in 1859 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pertamina (Persero).

It is also involved in the liquefied natural gas processing activity; trading of oil and gas; and exploration, exploitation, and business development in oil and gas. In addition, the company provides fiber optic rental for network services; construction and maintenance services to the customers; management and leasing services for buildings and equipment; and engineering and consultancy services. The company was founded in 1859 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Perusahaan Gas Negara Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Pertamina (Persero).

The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Jakarta, Indonesia.

It is also involved in the liquefied natural gas processing activity; trading of oil and gas; and exploration, exploitation, and business development in oil and gas. In addition, the company provides fiber optic rental for network services; construction and maintenance services to the customers; management and leasing services for buildings and equipment; and engineering and consultancy services. RAJA.JK.summary: PT Rukun Raharja Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, operates as an integrated energy provider in Indonesia. It is involved in the distribution and storage of natural gas and fuel; operation and maintenance of gas facilities; gas transmission and compression activities; and electricity generation and supply activities. The company also offers supporting services for oil and natural gas mining; consultations on mining; port management, loading-unloading containers; leasing and management of building; supporting facilities of property companies; and development planning and supervision consultation services. In addition, it is involved in the development, management, and operation of gas infrastructure; gas transmission pipeline capacity trading; and building construction and trading. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

TGRA.JK.summary: PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk focuses on developing, building, and operating renewable energy projects in Indonesia. The company operates through four segments: Rent, Hydro Power, Solar Power, and Trading segments. It is involved in developing hydro and solar power projects. The company was formerly known as PT. Mitra Megatama Perkasa and changed its name to PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk in 2016. PT. Terregra Asia Energy Tbk was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Jakarta Barat, Indonesia.
